1. La La Land (2016) - This musical film starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling is based on the classic musical 'West Side Story' (1961). The story revolves around two young dancers: one is a innocent and naive girl named Emma; the other is an experienced and sophisticated boy named Ryan. As they both dance in various scenes, their paths cross each other, leading to various conflicts and romantic relationships. Overall, La La Land is a visually stunning musical film that tells an engaging story of love, jealousy, conflict, romance, and personal growth. It features excellent performances by its lead actors Emma Stone (Emma) and Ryan Gosling (Ryan)), as well as great music and production values. La La Land is definitely worth watching for anyone who enjoys musical films or wants to experience some great music and production values.
